name: Project Proxima
description:
FEATURES

  • A short existential horror experience
  • Explore a vast star system
  • Complete tasks to keep your space ship in shape
  • Multiple endings
  • Several secrets
  • Survive whatever lurks in the void

NAVIGATE

Your mission is to navigate through a star system and scan various planets to find a habitable environment. It won't be that easy, as space is an unforgivable, dangerous void. Stay alive by avoiding dangers and repairing your spacecraft.

DISCOVER

Scan objects and anomalies floating in space to find remnants of what happened in this star system and clues to what happened to yours.


STORY

Your home planet has been destroyed and there's no turning back. You're one of the lucky ones that has been sent out as a last resort to find another habitable planet and avoid extinction. The star system you've been assigned to explore may be subject to the same mysterious destruction yours was. Find out what happened and complete your mission.
